attributes.action: Speak to the Civil Authorities about a Homosexual Parade being held in San Francisco that mocks Christians
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Folsom Street fair, a Homosexual Parade is intending to mock the faith of Christians on the 30th of September.
It will be a mockery of Jesus Christ"s Last Supper.
The Advert portrays Christ & his disciples as half naked homosexual sadomasochists intermixedwith sex toys.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
